## Datases

This document lists the datasets used in the landscape on marine genetic resources in the ASEAN region

## PATSTAT

The IISC electronic version of PATSTAT was used to generate searches in PATSTAT for the ASEAN countries

Dataset 1: asean_person_country_patstat.vpt

This 6 gigabyte dataset in VantagePoint format contains 109,744 application records where the person_country in PATSTAT table tls206_person countrys contained a two letter country code that was either xxxxxx.
